data.title: Sea temperature in september in Port Sud-Est - Swimming in september 2024
data.meta_description: Is it pleasant to swim in Port Sud-Est (on the island of Rodrigues) in september? Information about the sea temperature near this city in september 2024.
data.text:
Swimming in Port Sud-Est in september 2024: Average sea temperature in september and tide times in september 2024

Average sea temperature in Port Sud-Est in september 2024.

In september, according to seasonal norms, the sea temperature in Port Sud-Est is:

Minimum: 22.6°C

Average: 23.2°C

Maximum: 24.1°C

Other useful seasonal weather averages in september:

Outside temperature: 22.2°C to 23.4°C

Most common weather: "Partly Cloudy"

The wind blows at 23km/h

It rains a total of 31mm, over 1 day(s).

Sea temperature in Port Sud-Est in august

Sea temperature in Port Sud-Est in october

Should we swim in Port Sud-Est in september?

Yes! The water temperature in Port Sud-Est in september is pleasant

Swimming in september is pleasant in Port Sud-Est and the surrounding area. The sea temperature is 23.2°C on average (min/max: 22.6°C/24.1°C), allowing you to swim for a long time and enjoy water sports.

Note also that in september, the climate is good with an average outside temperature of 22.82°C, 30.7mm of precipitation (over 1 days) and 76.53 % humidity.
